
## Class : esophagus mucosa

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002469
 * *Label* = esophagus mucosa
 * *Definition* = A mucosa that is part of a esophagus [Automatically generated definition]. [ [database_cross_reference](../../ef/oboInOwl#hasDbXref.md) = OBOL:automatic ]
